item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Home.Alone.2.Lost.in.New.York.1992.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Home Alone 2: Lost in New York

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Alternate Artwork 7 | Alternate Artwork 8 | Alternate Artwork 9 | Alternate Artwork 10 | Alternate Artwork 11 | Alternate Artwork 12 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Poster 4 | Poster 5 | Poster 6 | Thumbnail 1 | Thumbnail 2 | Key Art


1992 • 2h 1m
Family, Comedy

Description
Kevin McCallister is home alone in New York City, but he won't be alone for long because the notorious Wet Bandits, Harry and Marv, are also in the Big Apple.
Click to expand...
Trailers

Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
Kevin McCallister is in New York City with enough money to turn the Big Apple into his own playground! But Kevin won't be alone for long. The notorious Wet Bandits, Harry and Marv, still smarting from their last encounter with Kevin, are bound for New York too, plotting a huge holiday heist. Kevin's ready to welcome them with a battery of booby traps the bumbling bandits will never forget!
Duration: 2h 1m
Release Date: 1992
Genre: Family, Comedy
Rating:
Director: Chris Columbus
Starring: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Devin Ratray, Catherine O'Hara
Click to expand...
